mcq.statement: What is significant about Shimogamo Shrine and Kamigamo Shrine in Japan?

options.a: They are the largest shrines in Japan
options.b: They are the most modern shrines in Japan
options.c: They are two of the most important and oldest shrines in Japan

mcq.one_liner: Shimogamo Shrine and Kamigamo Shrine are among the **most important and oldest shrines in Japan**.
